abstract: Nancy Pelosi selected seven House Democrats to prosecute the case against President Trump in the Senate.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Pelosi oversees the most diverse caucus in the history of the House of Representatives, which served as a guiding principle in how she chose her team of prosecutors. The group features several lawyers, a former police chief, three women, two African-Americans and one Latina.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
